summary: This document details the disposal of a lease for a 2005 Marathon Motor Coach by Requiro Scientia LLC, including financial transactions related to the lease payoff and lien release. It includes communications between various individuals at Fifth Third Bank regarding the lease and its payoff.

persons.name: Lisa Petrina
persons.context: Lisa Petrina is involved in the preparation and processing of the disposal form for Requiro Scientia LLC.

persons.name: Randy Willoughby
persons.context: Randy Willoughby is involved in approving the lease payoff and related financial transactions.

persons.name: Christine Ulmenstine
persons.context: Christine Ulmenstine is involved in the communication regarding the lease payoff and financial instructions.

persons.name: Meghan Stewart
persons.context: Meghan Stewart is involved in the request for the lease payoff letter and is a point of contact for Requiro Scientia LLC.

persons.name: Vickie Gnau
persons.context: Vickie Gnau is involved in facilitating the lease payoff process and communications.

persons.name: Jennifer Wise
persons.context: Jennifer Wise is involved in assisting with the request for the lease payoff quote.

connections.description: Lisa Petrina prepared the disposal form which Randy Willoughby approved.
Christine Ulmenstine communicated with Randy Willoughby regarding the lease payoff instructions.
Meghan Stewart and Vickie Gnau collaborated on the lease payoff process.
Vickie Gnau and Jennifer Wise communicated regarding the lease payoff quote request.

events.title: Lease Disposal
events.description: The lease for the 2005 Marathon Motor Coach was disposed of by Requiro Scientia LLC.

events.title: Lease Payoff Communication
events.description: Communication regarding the lease payoff letter and financial instructions took place among bank staff.

keyFacts: The disposal date for the lease was October 1, 2018.
The total amount due for the lease payoff was $43,702.75.
The lease was for a 2005 Marathon Motor Coach with VIN 2PCV3349341014962.
There were multiple communications regarding the lease payoff among bank staff.
A lien release for the vehicle was requested following the payoff.
